recipesJson.name: Teleos Crunch (blind remix)
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Over the years I have seen numerous recipes on this ejuice dating back to 2015 not much has changed @Developed  did the remix of the fruity version this is the crunch berry version. I have never tasted this ejuice I'm going by description and what I think it should taste like.. on the shake it's definitely tasty but give it time for the creams to developed.
